thoughts.text: The execute_shell command was successful in listing the files in the current directory. Now I can use the read_file command to read the file I previously wrote to.
thoughts.reasoning: The execute_shell command was successful in listing the files in the current directory. I want to verify that the file I previously wrote to exists, and the read_file command can be used to do that.
thoughts.plan: - Use the read_file command to read the file I previously wrote to.
